result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

charges.descr: Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal 4th+)

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Kevin L Cooper

defendant.name: Cooper, Kevin L
defendant.address: N85w14042 Fond Du Lac Ave, Menomonee Falls, WI 53051

records.addlTxt:
Andrew Nesheim appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant Kevin L Cooper in court.  

Court conducts colloquy with the defendant his waiver of counsel.
Defendant wants to proceed without counsel.
Court will accept the defendant's waiver of counsel.

Matter is dismissed and read into case:  20CT1158
Defendant to comply with I.D. Processing.  Defendant is not to operate a motor vehicle unless properly licensed.  Comply with all licensing restrictions.

10:01 AM Defendant Kevin L Cooper in court.  Andrew Nesheim appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

Defense acknowledges receipt of complaint and waives reading of complaint.  
Service admitted/advised of charges and potential penalties.  
Court advises of right to an attorney.  
NOT GUILTY PLEA ENTERED BY COURT.  Hearing scheduled for July 7, 2022 at 10:30 am.
Initial appearance on May 3, 2022 at 08:15 am.

10:21 AM Defendant Kevin L Cooper not in court.  Christian Farina appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court notes 21CF711 is set for April 25, 2022 at 10:00 am before the Trial Court.  The Court will adjourn the initial appearance to the next date before the Trial Court.  Initial appearance scheduled for April 25, 2022 at 10:00 am.

**MINUTES UPDATED:  Court was informed this defendant Kevin L. Cooper is not the same defendant that is currently set for April 25, 2022 at 10:00 am and this defendants case is not set until July before Judge Schimel.  The Court will adjourn this matter for two weeks and send notice to the defendant.
